name: Puppy Maker!
description:
Puppy Maker

Great FREE app for Kids or all ages

Simply slide left/right to pick your puppies body then pick his eyes the same way, when you have got it as you like him click on the accessories to add things like Hats, Bones, Ties etc..

When you have made your puppy you can save it to your device or share it on Facebook and twitter.

FREE APP

Works on all devices and all HD images for the new iPad

For more free apps go to
http://www.SlinkyApps.com
